name: Drive to Work Simulator 2
description:
Drive to work, while hitting ragdolls, and dodging bad meta-narratives! In this game, you must get to work, but there's a twist- the roads are filled with ragdolls! Hit as many as you can to get the highest score!

Features 9 levels to... test your ragdoll-murdering skills on!

Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity Mundane Jam!
This game requires an okay computer to run, it uses a lot of lights and a lot of fancy textures. You've been warned!
